verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] ordered cuts in federal grants for cities that offer safe harbor for undocumented immigrants .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: ordered] [ARG2: cuts in federal grants for cities that offer safe harbor for undocumented immigrants] .
President Donald Trump has ordered cuts in federal grants for [ARG0: cities] [R-ARG0: that] [V: offer] [ARG1: safe harbor for undocumented immigrants] .
